title: Traffic Data Analysis
output: html_document

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

## Reading Data

```{r}
data = read.csv("all-semi-unique.csv")
names(data)
str(data)
summary(data)
```

Having a look on the number of rows, number of columns and the first few rows of the data:

```{r}
nrow(data)
ncol(data)
head(data)
```

## Cleaning Data

Removing advertisements columns:

```{r}
data <- data %>% select(-starts_with("ad."))
ncol(data)
names(data)
head(data)
```
